meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2697.

td.p: Janet Grunwald, a substitute teacher from Port Washington, New York
Girts Lorencis, a computer analyst from Kalamazoo, Michigan
Dave Cook, a writer from New York City, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,199)

tr.td: PORTS & HARBORS
THE OCCULT
RECKLESS PHRASES
FRUITS & VEGETABLES
SCIENCE HISTORY
"BLUE" MOVIES
